turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Shane Edwards.
turn.1: What happened in the final of the 1998 season?
turn.2: For his performance in that match he received his first Brownlow Medal vote.
turn.3: What else did you find interesting about this article?
turn.4: Edwards finished the season having again played 16 matches, but with one more goal and 20 more disposals than the previous year.
turn.6: 2009 began with Edwards in the club's best 22, where he stayed through the first three rounds of the season.
turn.8: But a six disposal performance in Round 3 saw him dropped to reserves level where stayed until Round 7.
turn.10: He did not go selected the following week however, and remained at reserves level until the midway point of the season.
turn.11: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.12: But when coach Terry Wallace was sacked prior to Round 12, Edwards saw new opportunity under caretaker Jade Rawlings.
